channel.title: A few things i need help with
channel.description:
1. The log out glitch, if you spam the log out button it lags out the while server to the login page.
2. Those wilderness teleporters the purple ball thing >.< it just lights up but it doesnt tele you anywhere..?
3. Chaotic rapier hits like a Chatoic longsword how could i change the way it hits so it can like poke people O_o
Thanks for reading! if you think its better if you do just say and il give my teamviewer.

item.title: A few things i need help with
item.dc:creator: @Army123 Army123
item.description:
@Army123 wrote:

[quote=“Lil wayne fan, post:1, topic:424095”]1. The log out glitch, if you spam the log out button it lags out the while server to the login page.

  1. Those wilderness teleporters the purple ball thing >.< it just lights up but it doesnt tele you anywhere…?

  2. Chaotic rapier hits like a Chatoic longsword how could i change the way it hits so it can like poke people O_o

Thanks for reading! if you think its better if you do just say and il give my teamviewer.[/quote]

to fix problem number 3 go to server file
than data>cfg>spawn-config
find chaotic rapier and change attack to 1 and max hit to 0 or 1

Read full topic
